installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# NodeJS Bot Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python python-dev libtool

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

git clone https://github.com/fosscord/fosscord-server .

cd bundle
echo "Building Fosscord"
echo "PORT=$SERVER_PORT" > /mnt/server/bundle/.env
mkdir /mnt/server/api/assets/plugins
/usr/local/bin/npm run setup

echo -e "install complete"
exit 0
